es.ull.iis.simulation.core.flow
Interface SynchronizationFlow

All Superinterfaces:
ANDJoinFlow, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>, FinalizerFlow, Flow, Identifiable, JoinFlow, MergeFlow, SimulationObject, SingleSuccessorFlow
All Known Implementing Classes:
SynchronizationFlow, SynchronizationFlow
public interface SynchronizationFlow
extends ANDJoinFlow

An ANDJoinFlow which passes only when all the incoming branches have been activated once. It is reset when all the incoming branches are activated exactly once (both true and false). Meets the Synchronization pattern (WFP3).

Author:
Yeray Callero
